amendment.description: Amendment sought to prohibit funding for the the USDA market access program.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 22 as printed in the Congressional Record to prohibit the use of funds in the bill for USDA's Market Access Program which provides grants to businesses and trade associations to promote exports of agricultural products.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Chabot amendment (A013) Failed by recorded vote: 150 - 277 (Roll no. 316).
